name: You've Got A Friend(We've Got A Band)
lyric:
You've Got a Friend (We've Got a Band)
(一峰 and谢安琪)

When you are down and troubled
And you need some loving care
And nothing， nothing is going right
Close your eyes and think of me
And soon I will be there
To brighten up even your darkest night
You just call out my name
And you know wherever I am
I will come running to see you again
Winter, spring, summer or fall
All you have to do is call
And I will be there
You've got a friend
If the sky above you
Grows dark and full of clouds
And that old north wind begins to blow
Keep your head together
And call my name out loud
Soon you will hear me knocking at your door
Aint it good to know that you have got a friend
When people can be so cold
They will hurt you, and desert you
And take your soul if you let them
Oh, but dont you let them
You just call out my name
And you know wherever I am
I will come running to see you again
Winter, spring, summer or fall
All you have to do is call
And I will be there
You've Got a Friend
We've Got a Band
You've Got a Friend
◇嗳一世音乐◇
by.MandY丸
We've Got a Band
You've Got a Friend
You've Got a Friend

comments.brief: 娱乐圈的一方净土，全方位的一位艺人
有点模仿杜雯慧张专辑《人间定格》里面的 You&#039;ve Got A Friend 个人感觉！
好像娃娃和黄玠的组合
超爱这首歌！！如果能找到一个会弹吉他的一起合唱就好了！！
